Name: Fun Quest
About the game: Fun quest - Relive the old days with this arcade game inspired by genre pioneers like breakout and pong. Clear the playing field from blocks, collect bonuses and try to beat your own record in this game! Knock out all pre-angled blocks of varying difficulty, don't let the ball fall, you only have one life, each level gets more and more difficult! Peculiarities: - Nice graphics Noana - Nice soundtrack by PIXELbit
